name: Backgammon ▽▲
description:
Play the classic game of Backgammon for free!

Backgammon Free! supports 1 and 2 player gameplay, so you can play with friends or against a challenging computer opponent.

• Three difficulties of AI: easy, medium, and hard.
• Simple & Intuitive controls.
• Theme customization including board and background colors.
• Move highlighting for easy play.
• Configurable match points.
• Doubling Cube.
• Play as White or Black chips.
• Hands down the best looking Backgammon on the store.
• Universal app tailored for iPad and iPhone.

If you've been looking for a great Backgammon game for your iPad or iPhone, you've found it!
